685830.name: SwapQuest Soundtrack
685830.description:
It's the official soundtrack of SwapQuest, containing 26 tracks with an overall length of 54 minutes. Also available as a bundle with the game.

Track list:
1) Main Theme - 1:22
2) Character Select - 0:32
3) Intro - 4:04
4) Tutorial - 1:21
5) World Map - 0:35
6) Caravan - 0:31
7) Challenge - 1:06
8) Boss Theme - 2:15
9) Lumina Meadows - 2:03
10) Slumberous Woods - 2:37
11) Crystal Mine - 1:54
12) Haunted Grove - 2:29
13) Lumina Village - 1:58
14) Marsh of the Lost - 1:54
15) Silent Acre - 2:07
16) The Great Lake - 1:55
17) Ardor Desert - 1:59
18) Forgotten Fields - 2:15
19) Temple of Isaaru - 1:52
20) Sky Pillar - 2:40
21) Inside the Horde - 2:50
22) Outro - 4:23
23) Trailer Theme - 1:03
24) Tropicallo Jungle
25) Din's Rock
26) Sunny Sandbank
